CONTENTS.P: Procurement reference: 9023-IFT-47477
Project name: Khujand Solid Waste Management Project
Country: The Republic of Tajikistan
Business sector: MEI
Project ID: 47477
Funding source: EBRD and SSF grant
Type of contract: Goods and associated services
Type of notice: Invitation for Tenders
Issue date: 12.3.2018
Closing date: 2.5.2018, 14:00 local time

This invitation for tenders follows the general procurement notice for this project which was published on the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) website, procurement notices (www.ebrd.com) on 8644-GPN-47477 dated 10.4.2017

The Communal State Unitary Enterprise (CSUE) «Khizmatrasonii Naqliyoti Sanitari of Khujand city»,hereinafter referred to as “the Purchaser”, intends using part of the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) and grant from the EBRD’s SSF towards the cost of Khujand Solid Waste Management Project.
The Purchaser now invites sealed tenders from Suppliers for the following Contracts to be funded from part of the proceeds of the loan and Grant:
KhSWMP- II- 002 Procurement of waste containers, equipment, special uniform and protection means:
Lot № 1. Procurement of containers for collection of solid waste
— containers with capacity in 0,75 m3 – 700 pcs,
— containers with capacity at least in 17 m3 for the multi-lift unit (Closed type) – 40 pcs,
— containers with capacity at least in 15 m3 for the multi-lift unit (open type) – 10 pcs.
Lot № 2 procurement of equipment for workshop
— universal screw-cutting lathe –1 pc,
— universal vertical turning mill - 1 pc,
— compressor equipment – 2 pcs,
— welding unit - 2 pcs,
— pipe-fitter bench – 7pcs,
— test bench for diagnostic and fuel pump control - 1 pc,
— pneumatic oil collector with measuring flask – 1 pc,
— mobile oil gun 220l barrel – 1 pc,
— tire changer machine for trucks – 1 pc,
— universal wheel balancing machine for trucks – 1 pc,
— loading trolley, air hydraulic jack - 1 pc,
— wheel repair vulcanizer – 1 pc,
— impact pneumatic screwdriver – 1pc.
Lot № 3 procurement of special uniform and protection means
— special uniform (summer season) –240 sets,
— special uniform (winter season) - 240 sets,
— special foot-wear (year-round)– 240 sets,
— rubber boots - 240 pairs,
— individual protection kit (respirators, helmets, protective glasses and gloves) – 120 sets,
— fire extinguisher - 60 pcs,
— first aid kit – 120 sets.
The lots will be implemented concurrently and should be completed within 6 months.
Tenders are invited for 1 or more lots. Each lot must be priced separately. Tenders for more than one lot may offer discounts and such discounts will be considered in the comparison of tenders.
Tendering for contracts that are to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the bank is open to firms from any country.
To be qualified for the award of a contract, tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:
a— average annual turnover as prime Supplier (defined as billing for Goods and Services delivered and under delivery) over the last 3 years of at least:
Lot №1 — 1 365 000 USD equivalent;
Lot №2 — 250 000 USD equivalent;
Lot №3 — 95 000 USD equivalent

b— The tenderer shall demonstrate that it has access to, or has available, liquid assets, unencumbered real assets, lines of credit, and other financial means sufficient to meet the production cash flow for the contract estimated, taking into account the tenderer's commitments for other contracts as not less than:
Lot №1 — 365 000 USD equivalent,
Lot №2 — 65 000 USD equivalent,
Lot №3 — 25 000 USD equivalent,

c— Experience as supplier, in at least 2 contracts within the last 5 years that have been successfully and substantially completed and that are similar to the proposed goods each with a value of at least:
Lot № 1 — 365 000 USD equivalent,
Lot № 2 — 65 000 USD equivalent,
Lot № 3 — 25 000 USD equivalent.
The similarity shall be based on the physical size, complexity, methods /technology or other characteristics as described in Section VI, supply requirements.

d— The tenderers shall, be represented by an agent in the purchaser country who will perform maintenance of supplied equipment, its repairing and spares part stocking (in the case if the Tenderer and agent are different) (for lot № 2).
e— Joint ventures, consortiums or associations (JVCA) of 2 and more partners shall meet the following minimum qualification requirements:
1— all partners of JVCA combined shall meet all criteria listed above,
2— all partners shall be jointly and severally liable,

3— the lead partner shall demonstrate at least 1 contact per Lot successfully executed and at least 70 % of the required average annual turnover and of the financial resources requirements while each other partner shall meet at least 30 % of those requirements;

4. Authorized representative of JVCA must have a power of attorney to conduct all business for and on behalf of any and all the partners of JVCA during tender process and, in the event of the contract, during contract execution.
f— Tenderers wishing to tender for more than one lot shall meet cumulative (combined) qualification criteria for average annual turnover and financial resources for selected lots.

Tender documents may be obtained from the office at the address below upon payment of a nonrefundable fee of 100 USD in dollars or in Tajik Somoni according to the exchange rate of National Bank of Tajikistan at the payment date to the following bank account:.
Dollar account:
Beneficiary: СSUE Khizmatrasonii Naqliyoti Sanitari of Khujand city »

Bank of Beneficiary: “Amonatbonk” in Khujand, Tajikistan, SWIFT ASSETJ 22
Correspondent Bank: Sberbank Russia Federation, Moscow, Russia, SWIFT: SABR RU MM
Intermediary bank: The Bank of New York, SWIFT IRVTUS3N
Tajik Somoni account:
SSB “Amonatbank” in Khujand
Khujand, Tajikistan,
Bank identification code: 350101626
Taxpayer identification number: 510000842
Correspondent account: 20402972316264

Upon receiving appropriate evidence of payment of the non-refundable fee, the documents will be promptly dispatched by courier, however, no liability can be accepted for loss or late delivery. If requested the documents can also be dispatched electronically after the presentation by the prospective tenderer of appropriate evidence of payment of the non-refundable fee. In the event of any discrepancy between electronic and hard copies of the documents, the hard copy shall prevail.
All tenders must be accompanied by a tender security as follows:
Lot № 1: 15 000 USD
Lot № 2: 2 500 USD
Lot № 3: 1 000 USD
Or its equivalent in a convertible currency.
